overview: This December  marks the fourth Looniversary of World of Mayhem, one of the most robust projects we've developed here at Aquiris! To celebrate, we produced an exclusive behind the scenes documentary which tells in depth about what it's like to develop this wacky world of an intellectual property that is so beloved to several generations of players!
tagline: A "Looney Tunes: World of Mayhem" Documentary
title: Ouch! Behind the Mayhem
